item.title: Need Help With 2 Things
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

  1. Entangling
  2. Tele glitch

I used to have this on my old server where if the played tried to move while entangled/barraged it would just keep teleport them back to there spot until the timer was up.

I have since formated my computer due to major problems and lost my source. Right now I’m using Cheezscape 80 (same thing as my old server) And I cant quit remember how to make the entangle timers work right while continually teleport them back to the spot.

Also one more question

When I cast Varrock teleport or any teleports it gives defense EXP but it should be giving mage exp like all the other spells

if (s == "Varrock") { teleX = 3210; teleY = 3424; addSkillXP((25*playerLevel[6]), 1); newheightLevel = 0; }

That is the code for my Varrock teleport.

Also every other spell thats not a teleport and has the

playerLevel[6]

In it it gives magic experience…

So if someone could please help me out with these problems.

Read full topic
